row.process: ! ---------------------------------- ! Parameter für JOBI.SQL definieren: ! ---------------------------------- :SET &ORASCRIPT# = "&BATCH_LC#.sql" :SET &ORADB# = "&ORADB_DST#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "SPIEGELAPP" ! ---------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ | tee &RUNDIR#/&ORASCRIPT# prompt Ausgeben Datum und Timestamp select sysdate, systimestamp, user from dual; set timing on set echo on exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('BB') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('BBS') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('BI') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('CD') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('COURTAGE') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('CRM') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('EK') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('IMS') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('MEV') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('NB') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('NG') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('PDB') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('KDB') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('PR') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('SD') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('SERV') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('TUSSY') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('VU') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disablefks('ZFA') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disableTableFKs('CTV', 'TBPTXKV_VGA_BRIEF') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disableTableFKs('CTV', 'TBPTXBRPA') exec dbatools.uc4tools.disableTableFKs('CTV', 'TBPTX_CTV_ORG') __EOF__ ! ---------------------------------------- ! Aufruf des SQL-Includes für csv-Ausgabe: ! ---------------------------------------- export TNS_ADMIN="/usr/lib/oracle/11.2/client/network/admin" :INC JOBI.SQL ! ------------------ ! Returncode setzen: ! ------------------ exit $rc
